title: Heki-un-so and Kyoto
brief_description: A visit to the ancient city of Kyoto which is the cradle of ten centureis of history and tradition. Shows the beautiful Heki-un-so gardens, created in the traditional Japanese style, during the four seasons of the year, as well as many examples of ancient and modern Japanese buildings, a tea ceremony and many ceremonies and festivals which are part of the way of life in this ancient capital city of Japan.
